committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to limit the number of public holidays which may be established by Federal statute or Executive order.

summary.text: Provides that any legal public holiday declared by Federal statute or executive order that would result in the number of such holidays in a calendar year exceeding ten shall be treated as a regular workday.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to limit the number of public holidays which may be established by Federal statute or Executive order.
